reviews.review_msg:
I hate math but I liked her class. She is very flexible and helpful. 
 I thoroughly enjoyed her lectures and will certainly use the knowledge that I've gained. :)

Sean is extremely sweet & understanding. He's clearly dedicated to providing the utmost support for his students. The class had a very unique angle by asking us to examine Math as a "gate keeper" of sorts. Although it's biased of me since I'm not a "Math student" by any means, I found myself agreeing with his less "traditional" or clinical approach
